story.title: Story: Google Search As a user I want to search for a keyword on Google So that I can find relevant information

examples.step: Given I am on the Google home page
When I enter <keyword> in the search bar
And I click the search button
Then I should see results that include the text <expectedText>

steps.step: Given I am on the Google home page
When I enter JBehave in the search bar
And I click the search button
Then I should see results that include the text What is JBehave?
